main event: Several persons reported observations of an intense light in the form of a flash, followed by a glowing green object traveling in a northerly direction during the early morning hours of 12 Aug 58 near Beebeetown, Iowa.
interesting points: The observer was awoken by a light on the bedroom wall that resembled headlights from a car turning in a driveway., The object was described as round and white, comparable in size to the rising sun., Three others witnessed a bluish-white to green object in the same area., The light was observed for less than one minute., Multiple reports emerged from the Omaha and Lincoln areas regarding the sighting.
witness description: Civilians including a farmer's wife among others.
